resources.string: Proximity Lock allows the user to lock their device by simply tapping their finger on the proximity sensor (usually located adjacent to the earpiece).
While holding a finger on your device\'s proximity sensor, press the button below.
WARNING: Calibrating without touching the sensor may cause problems.
TEST YOUR CALIBRATION USING THE INDICATOR ABOVE, OR ELSE RE-CALIBRATE
Check the box to enable Proximity Lock
Check the box to enable an app shortcut in your notification shade
Change the time needed for the proximity sensor to lock your device
Change the sensor value that triggers Proximity Lock
